rule_summary: 现在完成时用于表示过去发生但与现在有联系的动作，或表示持续到现在的动作。
examples: I have lived in this city for five years.
They have never been to Paris.

rule_summary: 过去进行时用于表示过去某个时间点正在进行的动作，或为另一个动作提供背景。
examples: I was reading a book when the phone rang.
She was cooking dinner at 6 PM.

rule_summary: 一般将来时用于表示未来的动作、预测或自发决定。
examples: I will help you with your project.
They will probably win the game.

rule_summary: 第一条件句用于表示真实的可能性，一个动作依赖于另一个动作。
examples: If it rains tomorrow, I will stay at home.
If you study hard, you will pass the exam.
If he comes early, we will have dinner together.
